description: The foreboding tone of your dirge is especially effective at unsettling your enemies.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Ability to perform dirge of doom.

sections.text: The range of your dirge of doom ability is extended to 60 feet. Additionally, if a creature is shaken from another effect, the effect of your dirge of doom is changed to frightened for that specific creature. This benefit cannot cause a creature to become panicked, even if a target is already frightened from another effect.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: The range of dirge of doom is 30 feet. A creature that is already shaken cannot become frightened by dirge of doom.
sections.name: Normal

prerequisites: Ability to perform dirge of doom
name: Improved Dirge of Doom
